text: Pholidobolus paramuno is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Colombia. ==References== Category:Pholidobolus Category:Reptiles of Colombia Category:Endemic fauna of Colombia Category:Reptiles described in 2018 Category:Taxa named by Juan P. Hurtado- Gómez Category:Taxa named by Juan Camilo Arredondo Salgar Category:Taxa named by Pedro M. Sales-Nunes Category:Taxa named by Juan M. Daza
title: Pholidobolus paramuno
